Important info: sadly, on April 2nd, 2008, two members of the 4 members of the band(lady ghost and Red Road Ghost) were killed in a car accident on the way to a show. The two other members, Blue Ghost and Red Road Ghost are recovering, though Red Road Ghost tragically is not cognitive, but we all hope he will get better.
